root.name: GTI Club+: Rally CÃ´te d'Azur
root.description: OverviewGTi Club Plus is a remake of the original GTi Club, which features online multiplayer, multiple difficulty settings, and new HD textures published by Konami, and currently available in PSN. The game is, for the most part, stripped down and true to its original. There are only few cars, and few tracks. The game also features a free-roam mode, but players have been complaining that there is nothing to do while free-roaming (similar to Need For Speed: Undercover)
